metadata.title: Endangered Species Act Petitions Received by Fish and Wildlife Service
metadata.description:
This report represents petitions received by the Fish and Wildlife Service.

Notes

  • This report only includes Federal Register publications relating to the petition process. Any further publications (proposed and final rulings) are not included in this report.
  • This report may include petitions related to the Administrative Procedures Act (APA) as pertaining to the Endangered Species Act (ESA).
metadata.metaDescription: Report of Petitions sent to the U.S. FWS regarding Listed species.

columns.title: Date Received by the FWS
columns.description: The earliest date that the petition was received by any office of the Fish and Wildlife Service or the Department of the Interior.

columns.title: Where the species is believed to or known to occur
columns.description: States and/or countries where the species on the petition are believed to or known to occur.  The information in this column will update as the FWS has new information.  It could deviate from what the original petition noted.

columns.title: Petitioner Name
columns.description: The name of the petitioner(s).  Multiple petitioners are represented as a bulleted list within the report.

columns.title: Requested Action
columns.description: This is the action as requested by the petitioner(s).  Multiple actions are represented as a bulleted list within the report.

columns.title: Petition Finding(s)
columns.description: Finding(s) as published in the Federal Register.  Multiple findings are represented by a bulleted list within the report.

columns.title: Petitions Document(s)
columns.description: Document(s) related to the petition.  Multiple documents are represented by a bulleted list within the report.
